Texas Hemp Business Council Names Mark Bordas as Executive Director. August 12, 2024 12:10 ET | Source: Texas Hemp Business Council Follow
The Texas Hemp Business Council (THBC) has appointed Mark Bordas as executive director. Bordas brings more than 30 years of government affairs experience.
